page.title: 08HUTHWAITE
page.content: Huthwaite is OK I suppose but sometimes it is a bit boring. Just around the corner from where I live there is a little park. There are two big parks in Huthwaite. Huthwaite is only a village and hasn't got many shops. It has got a library but it isn't that big. There are two schools in Huthwaite which are Common Road C of E Infants School and mine. Some parts of Huthwaite are quite nice. I live down Blackwell Road on Bonser Crescent. It is only a little street and there are not many houses. On the end of our street is a little lane. Near where I live are some fields, the first field you come to is called Top Field.
